text: Va dar xonahojaton ʙimoned va hamcun cilvagari [-i zanon dar davroni] cohilijati pesin, cilvagari [va xudnamoi] nakuned va namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed va az Alloh taolo va Pajomʙaras itoat kuned. Ej ahli xona [pajomʙar], cuz in nest Alloh taolo mexohad palidi [va ozori ʙegonagon]-ro az sumo dur namojad va komilan pokaton gardonad
